      Calls BoundsQueryUtils.boundsOnScreen(Node)
      BoundsQuery FxRobotInterface.bounds​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      Calls BoundsQueryUtils.boundsOnScreen(Bounds, Scene) with given scene's bounds
      BoundsQuery FxRobotInterface.bounds​(javafx.stage.Window window)
      Calls BoundsQueryUtils.boundsOnScreen(Bounds, Window) with the given window's bounds
